title: Is lissandra worth playing in lower elo.
body: I main taliyah and im used to playing control mages. But recently with the whole tali nerfs making her bad in mid, I was wondering if lissandra is effective in lower elo. She looks pretty fun to play?

replies.body: It is. In low elo, especially bronze/ silver no one respects herd CC and no one knows how to play against Lissandra, because in that elo no one is playing her.

I main Taliyah and Liss but I like Liss more.

It's especially easy in low elo with Lissandra because nobody is dodging your Q.
I love how you can control every single teamfight and you can carry the whole game if you know how to play her.
She is totally underrated imo and a "fuck you" to assassins.

She's considered weak atm but that doesn't matter in low elo.
She'll also receive a new passive in the next few patches and that will make her stronger.

She's really good in low elo, when climbing I had more success as utility and cc champions rather than assassins and heavy damage dealers. Maybe that's just my playstyle though. If you enjoy her kit I think u should def play her!

I play her only top lane. She counters a lot of the champs up there and ruining their day is just so much fun.

She is a good mid laner as well, it's just she is much funner top IMO.

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/platinum/plus/champion/Lissandra/

She has a better winrate for top lane actually. 

However it has been proven by challengers that the shove mid and roam strategy is the most effective way to play her.
If youre good enough then almost anything will work, but her kit is on the weaker side of things, and requires alot of macro to make work, all in all- Why play Liss when LeBlanc is freelo.
true ): tali is so fun but she just isn’t what she used to be, but broken champs like talon or leblanc just don’t feel as rewarding or fun.
Any champ is good in low elo if you know what you're doing on them.
